I cant get it working! Doesn't work in Media Player Classic, Windows Media Player 10, Winamp, IrfanView. And I have all the latest codecs and all.
Wich player is required and wich codecs?

Try using ffdshow + MediaPlayer classic (C:Program FilesWindows Media Playermplayer2.exe)...
That's the only two things i use to playbavk video-files!
If you install ffdshow, then make sure that you have deleted/uninstalled any previous codecs (also include audio-codecs!)!
ffdshow: http://sourceforge.net/projects/ffdshow

"The Ring Two 2005 PROPER XviD TS-DreamCD"

Codec = XviD

Try = Nero ShowTime2

you can also try VLC (http://www.videolan.org/vlc/)...
if you download ffdshow make sure to download the alpha version (latest!) - http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=53761&package_id=59355
